label: 小栗忠順
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
説明文: (1827-68). Hatamoto (2,500 koku). Bakufu official; Gaikoku-bugyo, 1860-61; Kanjo-bugyo, 1863, 1864-65. Member of Edo reform group in Bakufu's closing years, especially as military and naval expert. Executed 1868, after Restoration.
